name: 21 Steps
description:
Fun little facts:


The sum of all the dots in a die is equal to 21

The first 3 levels are supposedly tutorials... yet some people can't get past the 3rd one

CONTROLS
  • WASD to Move
  • [HOLD] SPACE BAR & WASD to Focus and Review the die
  • R to  Restart the level
RULES
  • The die can only move as many steps as DOTS on the TOP FACE at the START OF THE TURN [Remaining steps will be shown on the left side of the screen]
  • Used die faces will be DELETED after the turn ends
  • If the die ends the turn with an EMPTY FACE on the top or the SAME FACE THE TURN STARTED WITH the CURRENT TILE will fall and the die will be moved back to the START OF THE TURN
  • In order to WIN, the die needs to reach the red tile with no FACES or STEPS remaining [21 steps in total]
If you're having trouble understanding the mechanics of 21 STEPS, check out this short clip of LittleDoctorGames figuring it out:
